channel.title: Vps problem help
channel.description: I'm using linux 10GB vps from vpsland.com I don't know how to connect it, Could some1 please tell me how? I brought it 3 days ago, and got 2 days ago the details on my email but Idk what to do next. Anyone can help please? Thanks very much.

item.title: Vps problem help
item.dc:creator: @john5689 john5689
item.description:
@john5689 wrote:

[quote=“mich702703, post:2, topic:338099”]ok (i just got vps from vps land 2 so…) what uv got to do is open CMD and type MSTSC and something abouth remote desktop wil pop up.

they will ask an computer thingy… give the ip of ur VPS(in the mail) then a new pc screen will pop up. they will ask u to log in (user name= Administrator and the pass is the password u signd in on VPSland.com)

next u need to download JDK, java and ur source on the VPS. Go to No-ip.com and change ur no-ip server to the IP of ur vps els u can’t connect

if u got all that stuff click on run in ur source to run ur server and logg of or just reboot ur pc. ur server will be online (and if u are lucky then u can connect to ur server wich i can’t…)[/quote]

wow thx man i didn’t know how to use VPS land eigher but now i do

Read full topic

item.title: Vps problem help
item.dc:creator: @VestaPK VestaPK
item.description:
@VestaPK wrote:

[quote=“iobpkbarrage, post:1, topic:338099”]I’m using linux 10GB vps from vpsland.com
I don’t know how to connect it, Could some1 please tell me how? I brought it 3 days ago, and got 2 days ago the details on my email but Idk what to do next.
Anyone can help please?
Thanks very much.[/quote]

Do what “mich702703” said but then you don’t want to follow what he said about No-IP, download No-IP onto you’re VPS then follow this tutorial here and have the IP back you had before.

Read full topic

item.title: Vps problem help
item.dc:creator: @mich702703 mich702703
item.description:
@mich702703 wrote:

ok (i just got vps from vps land 2 so…) what uv got to do is open CMD and type MSTSC and something abouth remote desktop wil pop up.

they will ask an computer thingy… give the ip of ur VPS(in the mail) then a new pc screen will pop up. they will ask u to log in (user name= Administrator and the pass is the password u signd in on VPSland.com)

next u need to download JDK, java and ur source on the VPS. Go to No-ip.com and change ur no-ip server to the IP of ur vps els u can’t connect

if u got all that stuff click on run in ur source to run ur server and logg of or just reboot ur pc. ur server will be online (and if u are lucky then u can connect to ur server wich i can’t…)

Read full topic
